bullet points: Develop Big Red Beauty, an on-campus website directory listing beauty services offered by Cornell students to the student body using HTML and CSS to implement Figma designs.
Collaborate with co-presidents to organize weekly general meetings and plan social and professional events.
Coordinate and design web development workshops through collaboration with members and other organizations.
Oversee management of member projects by creating timelines and delegating tasks to project coordinators.
Completed onboarding task of updating the Our Team page of the website using HTML/CSS and Github.
Began transferring website to React to improve website capabilities while collaborating using Github.
Filmed informative marketing videos to promote the team ahead of Cornell Giving Day to maximize donations.
Utilized Figma to aid in redesigning website pages to enhance creative elements to improve user experience.
Collaborated with coworkers to expedite customer shopping experience to maintain a conversion rate of 30%.
Aided customers by maintaining organization and facilitating in finding specific sizes and colors of items.
Honed marketing skills by using knowledge of frequent purchases, current promotions, and customer motivations.
Researched applied queueing methods with group members to optimize Ithaca Transportation (TCAT) wait times.
Prepared deliverables and presentations for research advisor Prof. David Goldberg and distributed tasks weekly.
Developed basic Python simulation for the Ithaca TCAT incorporating data from Cornell Open Data Initiative
Learned basic Statistics Analysis System (SAS) syntax, macros, and formatting for onboarding to organize data.
Analyzed data using basic SAS to produce charts and tables for a Phase 2 clinical trial study of cancer medication.
Annotated manuals on clinical trial ethics and procedures while also learning standard workplace proceedings.
